headline: Valerie's Blackberry Cobbler
name: Valerie's Blackberry Cobbler
description: Try this super simple blackberry cobbler recipe the next time you find yourself with an abundance of blackberries for a tasty, comforting dessert.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Once oven temperature is reached, melt butter in a 9x13-inch baking pan.
Stir together flour, sugar, and milk in a medium bowl; batter will be slightly lumpy. Pour mixture on top of melted butter in the baking pan. Do not mix butter and mixture together.
Drop blackberries into batter; if more crust is desired add less blackberries. Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 1 hour.
